entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, 4.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Victoria Int'l Airport 3:00 PM PST Tuesday 28 February 2023

Temperature: 4.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.3 kPa rising
Visibility: 48.3 km
Humidity: 63 %

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers and risk of hail. Wind light except west 30 km/h near Juan de Fuca Strait early this afternoon. High 6. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 2:49 PM PST Tuesday 28 February 2023
